mapper.sql: Id, create_time, last_update_time, info_id,edit_id, type, status
mapper.update: update e_edit_log set status=0 where Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into e_edit_log ( create_time, last_update_time, info_id,edit_id, type, status) values (#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{infoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{editId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: update e_edit_log set last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, info_id = #{infoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, edit_id = #{editId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
